title: What Personality Type are YOU, GD?
body:
http://www.16personalities.com/personality-types for reference.

This is a pretty popular thing with 4 letters that explain your personality. 

Try it and let me know what you guys are and if you think it matches you.

I got INTJ and after reading all the descriptions (Architect) it is _eerily_ dead on. Describes my life perfectly.

http://www.statisticbrain.com/myers-briggs-statistics/ this shows stats on people in general and their test results.

I am the 2%?

Quite surprising is how people who care for others are the most common, (ISFJ) and its counterpart by one characteristic (INFJ) are the least common.

Seems like the large line is drawn between those who are feeling and intuitive. Overwhelmingly more are feeling.
